name: INDIVIDUAL_TO_PRICE_CLASS_RELATIONSHIP
description: Represents a potential reference relationship where 'IndividualRef' elements in the 'ContactInfoList' may correspond to specific 'PriceClassID' elements in the 'PriceClassList'. This relationship is inferred but not explicitly defined in the XML.
prompt: Validate that each <IndividualRef> in <ContactInfoList> corresponds to a valid <PriceClassID> in <PriceClassList>, based on external or implicit business rules.
